items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable text editor built with React, featuring essential functionalities like text manipulation, font styling, color customization, and undo/redo functionality. The project utilizes React hooks, context API, and CSS for a responsive and user-friendly interface.

The project utilizes React hooks, context API, and CSS for a responsive and user-friendly interface.
